item.title: Added zipcodestack.com
item.description: https://zipcodestack.com - Free Zip Code API and Postal Code Validation. 10000 free requests/month.

item.title: Added Visual Debug tool
item.description: https://visualdebug.com - - A Visual feedback tool for better client-dev communication

item.title: Added Webvizio
item.description: https://webvizio.com - Website feedback tool, website review software, and bug reporting tool for streamlining web development collaboration on tasks directly on live websites and web apps, images, PDFs, and design files.

item.title: Update README.md and include APIToolkit
item.description: https://apitoolkit.io - All the tools you need to fully understand what's going on in your APIs and Backends. With automatic API contract validation and monitoring. Free plan covers servers with up to 20,000 requests per month.

item.title: Fixed ZeroTier number of clients
item.description: https://www.zerotier.com - FOSS managed virtual Ethernet as a service. Unlimited end-to-end encrypted networks of 25 clients on free plan. Clients for desktop/mobile/NA; web interface for configuration of custom routing rules and approval of new client nodes on private networks

item.title: Merge branch 'master' into patch-1
item.description:
https://geocod.xyz) — Free geocoding API: Convert postal addresses into geographic coordinates or convert geographic coordinates into postal addresses (reverse geocoding - Free geocoding API: Convert postal addresses into geographic coordinates or convert geographic coordinates into postal addresses (reverse geocoding).
https://gokanban.io - Syntax based, no registration Kanban Board for fast use. Free with no limitations.
https://buildkite.com -
https://middleware.io/ - Middleware observability platform provides complete visibility into your apps & stack, so you can monitor & diagnose issues at scale. They have a free forever plan for Dev community use that allows Log monitoring for upto 1M log events, Infrastructure monitoring & APM for upto 2 hosts.
https://www.dronahq.com/ - DronaHQ - a low code platform helps engineering teams and product managers to build internal tools, custom user journeys, digital experiences, automations, custom admin panels, operational apps 10X faster.
https://zilore.com/en/dns - Free DNS hosting, free for 5 domains.
https://buttondown.email/ - Newsletter service. Up to 100 subscribers free
https://www.cloudmersive.com/email-verification-api - Email validation and verification API for developers, 800 free API requests/month
https://emaillabs.io/en - Send up to 9,000 Emails for free every month, up to 300 emails per day.
https://www.emailjs.com/ - This is not a full email server, this is just email client which you can use to send emails right from client send without exposing your credentials, the free tier has: 200 monthly requests, 2 email templates, Requests up to 50Kb, Limited contacts history.
https://emailvalidation.io - 100 free email verifications per month
https://hottempmail.com/ - Unlimited free temp email or disposable temporary email addresses. Autoexpires in one day.
https://www.mailcheck.ai/) - Prevent users to sign up with temporary email addresses, 120 requests/hour (~86,400 per month - Prevent users to sign up with temporary email addresses, 120 requests/hour (~86,400 per month)
https://mailchimp.com/ - 500 subscribers and 1,000 emails/month free
https://www.mailjet.com/) — 6,000 emails/month free (200 emails daily sending limit - 6,000 emails/month free (200 emails daily sending limit)
https://mailtrap.io/ - Fake SMTP server for development, free plan with 1 inbox, 100 messages, no team member, 2 emails/second, no forward rules
https://mailvalidator.io/ - Verify 300 emails/month for free, real-time API with bulk processing available
https://www.mail7.io/ - Free Temp Email Addresses for QA Developers. Create email addresses instantly using Web Interface or API
https://postmarkapp.com/ - 100 emails/month free, unlimited DMARC weekly digests
https://www.sender.net - to 15 000 emails/month, up to 2,500 subscribers
https://sendgrid.com/ - 100 emails/day and 2,000 contacts free
https://www.sendinblue.com/ - 9,000 emails/month, 300 emails/day free
https://sendpulse.com - 500 subscribers/month, 12,000 emails/month free
https://simplelogin.io/) – Open source, self-hostable email alias/forwarding solution. Free 5 Aliases, unlimited bandwith, unlimited reply/send. Free for educational staffs (student, researcher, etc - Open source, self-hostable email alias/forwarding solution. Free 5 Aliases, unlimited bandwith, unlimited reply/send. Free for educational staffs (student, researcher, etc).
https://takeout.bysourfruit.com - A constantly updated email service that makes sending emails extremely easy. 500 transactional emails/month free.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://www.illacloud.com/ - — ILLA Cloud - A robust open source low-code platform for developers to build internal tools. By using ILLA's library of Components and Actions, developers can save massive amounts of time on building tools. Free for 5 team members.
